tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My new born daughter has been under Dr. Laxmi's care since her first week.
This doctor actually listens to the complaints and makes a real effort to pinpoint the root cause of the problem based on the feedback (which is quite rare these days with other super busy doctors, who rely more on lab reports).
She thoroughly explains the causes of disease/discomfort and advises the best remedies, without prescribing unnecessary medications / diagnostic tests.
The doctor is friendly, service oriented and accessible during all working days.
The hospital itself is very well maintained and hygienic.
Consultation procedure is hassle free.
I highly recommend Dr Laxmi for all pediatric consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prasana is an amazing pediatrician. We had been under her supervision since the birth of my baby. It is due to her care and diligence that a fatal infection of my baby was diagnosed at the earliest stage. I am indebted to her for that support that actually saved my child.  Since then for every complication of my baby I visit this doctor. 

She is a very caring doctor **** ******** ********** She gives a lot of time to the parents to make them understand the causes of the illness his/her baby is suffering from and never suggests anything unnecessary. 

In a word she is what a pediatrician should be. I highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr Laxmi madam my child  age is  4yr  boy  always with I'll health and  always used to be very sick with cold and coff frequently but after the treatment with madam felt very happy and child is very active. visited, many hospitals but not completely cured, but when we came to madam explained very well and  good treatment *** **** *************

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our Twin babies were under doctor supervision from day 1, we were not even provided with vaccination chart and she never disclosed the initial vaccination given **** ***** ** ******** ************ ******* ******** ************* *********** ***** **** ******* I would never recommend her. ** ******* ******** ** *** ***** **** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** **** **** *********** *** *** ***** ** ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very patient  and gives good time to explain  the problem  and any queries. some doctors  get irritated  when parents become  impatient  but this doctor was polite  throughout.Doctor is available  in morning  and evening  which helps to take appointment  post office hours. I showed my son for fever and chest congestion  and breathing  problems . she was able to diagnose  the problems  and provided suitable  treatment  with which his breathing  problem has been addressed to great degree and we are really  thankful to Dr.lakshmi prasanna  . I would  recommend  her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

very thankful to prasad staff & Special Thanks to Dr. Prasanna Madam
